duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop technical skills in audit, tax, and advisory services.
Run client engagements and delegate work to staff.
Play a role in training and supervising staff.
Contribute to the growth and success of the firm by providing exceptional client service.
Have the opportunity to give back to local, regional, and global communities through participation in charitable outreach efforts.

education_certification.credential: CPA License or open in taking the CPA in the future.
0-5 years of experience in public accounting ideally, with audit services.
Outstanding attention to detail and initiative, creativity, and imagination in your approach to work.
Effective interpersonal and communication skills – both written and verbal.
